dcterms:creator: C. Ionescu
D. Papava
V. Olaru
C. Sminchisescu
dcterms:description: Human3.6M is the most common dataset for indoor 3D human pose estimation, consisting of 11 actors performing 15 different actions each, recorded by four stationary RGB cameras at 50 Hz.
dcterms:title: Human3.6M

dcterms:creator: D. Mehta
H. Rhodin
D. Casas
P. Fua
O. Sotnychenko
W. Xu
C. Theobalt
dcterms:description: MPI-INF-3DHP is a smaller but more challenging dataset for single-person 3D human pose estimation, featuring diverse motion, viewpoints, and environments, recorded in a green screen studio with 14 RGB cameras.
dcterms:title: MPI-INF-3DHP
